34. Financial risk management policies and objectives continued

[h] Credit risk Credit risk is limited to the risk arising from the inability of a customer to make payment when due. It is the Group’s policy to provide credit terms only to creditworthy customers These debts are continually monitored and therefore, the Group does not expect to incur material credit losses.
